record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="RAD command panel" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: RAD Command Panel utilities, (such as the Menu, Format Control, and Database functions) are Service Manager applications.
You can access them from their respective panels.
The command panels are analogous to the high-level commands used in other programming languages, but enable you to write sophisticated applications easily.
A command panel performs specific functions, such as process, join, and select.

detail.detail: Fields in a standard command panel:
Application: The name of the application of which the panel is a part.
Label: The name of this step in the application.
Comments: Describe the function this step performs.
Normal Exit: The level of the panel to go to if this panel runs successfully.
Error Exit: The level of the panel to go to if the panel fails to run successfully.
